comments.comment: Issara mama mr. Wimalwa penna bahahabai fan hithanawa ohu waradi kala.ewa dan awaboda karagena hafila athi kiyala.kamak naha ehema thama wenna oni.ohu thamai hamadema janathawata danaganna salasanne anith aya ohhokoma wahanawa .wimal baya wenna epa.api oba samaga innawa.owa balagena inna kotadak innawa.eka rajithalata amathaka wela athi api thama path kaletth api thama elawanneth.kisima widiyakin thananthara mila mudal yana wahana walata yatawena.danata parlimenthuwe inna bahutharayakma asamathjathi dahajara hadiyawak nathi  gekatawath wadda ganna sudusu nathi ithamath mindita mudal walata thamage jathiya pawadena Desapaluwo inna ratak kiya api dannawame para shakthiya thiyenne ahinsaka sinhala mahajanathawa athe.owun kawath rawatanna baha me para.kola nil kawaruth enna epa wachanayak katha karanna.ratama maha moode gilluwa.hodatama athi.
